snippet: Hugo Lindgren is not the only one here to make a vintage-magazine discovery. Three years ago, my husband and I bought a house built in 1906, located on the Hudson River in Northwest Yonkers. It's a D.I.Y. project that we call home.
abstract: Hugo Lindgren is not the only one here to make a vintage-magazine discovery. Three years ago, my husband and I bought a house built in 1906, located on the Hudson River in Northwest Yonkers. It's a D.I.Y. project that we call home.

headline.main: Stuff You Find in an Old House, Part II
